title: Explainable AI (XAI)
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Deep Networks are Black Boxes (Millions of weights). We don't know WHY they decide. 
**XAI**: Techniques to Interpret predictions. Crucial for Medicine/Law.

interview_questions.question: Why is XAI important in Banking?
interview_questions.answer: GDPR 'Right to Explanation'. Unless you explain why Loan was denied, you can't use the model.
